message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $750,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $925,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $925,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value.
